makeNftToERC20(address,address,uint256,a.details: Creates an Offer of One NFT for a static amount of ERC20 tokens

params.Amount: The total number of ERC20 tokens being offered
params.Erc20Contract: Address of the ERC20 Token that is being offered
params.ListerContract: Address of the NFT that is Listed or Being asked for.
params.ListerID: ID of the NFT that is Listed or Being asked for.
params.orderID: Unqiue number that will save the order on chain. Emits:

makeNftToETH(address,address,uint256).details: Creates an Offer of One NFT for a static amount of ERC20 tokens

params.ListerContract: Address of the NFT that is Listed or Being asked for.
params.ListerID: ID of the NFT that is Listed or Being asked for.
params.orderID: Unqiue number that will save the order on chain. Emits:

makeNftToNft(address,address,uint256,add.details: Creates an Offer of One NFT for One other NFT

params.BuyerContract: Address of the NFT being preposed to the lister.
params.BuyerID: ID of the NFT being preposed to the lister.
params.ListerContract: Address of the NFT that is Listed or Being asked for.
params.ListerID: ID of the NFT that is Listed or Being asked for.
params.orderID: Unqiue number that will save the order on chain. Emits:

takeOrder(address,address,bytes32).details: Triggers the trasnfer of assests for between the two parties once aggreed upon terms are matched. This is only callable by the person who owns the NFT that is being asked for.

params.Buyer: Address of the person submiting the offer
params.orderID: Unqiue ID that is given the the order stored on chain Emits:
